>>> torch.ones(2, 2, dtype=torch.float, device=1)

 1  1
 1  1
[torch.FloatTensor of size (2,2)]

This behavior is elsewhere (not related to this PR), although I'm not sure if it's the same code path:

variable(0).new(device=1)

body:
```
>>> torch.ones(2, 2, dtype=torch.float, device=1)

 1  1
 1  1
[torch.FloatTensor of size (2,2)]
```

This behavior is elsewhere (not related to this PR), although I'm not sure if it's the same code path:
```
variable(0).new(device=1)

[torch.FloatTensor of size (0,)]
```
